h2.span: Welcome to the Home of the Rams!

p.span: Welcome to Glenwood Community School District: Proud Past, Successful Present, Growing Future! In partnership with our community, GCSD staff members are committed to developing in our students the knowledge and skills required of responsible citizens. We serve more than 2,000 students from preschool to 12th grade on five campuses. We are located in southwest Iowa, approximately 20 miles southeast of Omaha, Nebraska. Glenwood Community School District serves the communities of Glenwood, Mineola, Silver City and Pacific Junction, Iowa.

p.span:
Welcome to Glenwood Community School District!
We hope you find what you are looking for in our site and hope you will visit our District and Community. Our district is made up of the communitites of Pacific Junction, Silver City, Mineola, and Glenwood. We are just a short twenty minute drive South and a little East of Council Bluffs Iowa on HWY34. I would love to give you a tour of our outstanding district. You can get in touch with me by clicking on my name or contact me at my office number below. Have a great day!
Sincerely,
Devin Embray

div.div: 103 Central, Glenwood, IA 51534 | Phone 712-527-9034 | Fax 712-527-4287 | Annual Notice of Nondiscrimination
